Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>So you went to <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>.
I appreciate you updating me on
the situation there...
I'm sorry those pirates trashed the place.
Undoing the damage will take hard work—<sp:5:0:0>
and hard cash.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Because my husband frankly doesn't
make much money, I'd better work extra
hard so we can pitch in!
Back to it!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar>Heeey! Welcome! It's your first time at
my store, right?<sp:0:4:0>It's the only place to shop here in
Lookout Landing. I know it looks a
little thrown together...
But I stock a nice selection of goods.
I ran a store back in my hometown, so
I hope you like my place here!
Talk_23: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar>Heeey! Welcome!<sp:0:4:0>Heading out? Stock up before you go!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar>Heeey! Welcome! You're out pretty
late, huh?<sp:0:4:0>Stock up with whatever you need. Buy
lots and lots!
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm afraid you caught us at a bad time.
We're sold out of everything.<sp:0:4:0>This is not the pace I'm used to.
The general store I ran in my <clr:0000>hometown<clr:ffff>
almost never sold out.<sp:0:4:0>Anyway, thank you for dropping by!
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll restock our sold-out items, so do
come again!
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for telling me about the situation
in Lurelin Village.

I can't tell you how upset I was when
I heard how those pirates had trashed
everything.
Now I'll be able to do business with a
clear head.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>...Oh! Before you go.


I couldn't help but notice that lovely
fabric you've got.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Have you thought about bringing it to
the dye shop in Hateno Village?

That's a hamlet on the edge of Necluda,
southeast of here.

It's not exactly close, but I think you'll
find it's well worth the journey!
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm afraid I can't take that off your hands.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Huh? You want me to buy you too?
Take that off before you sell it to me.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you! I ordered that special.
I'm sure you'll get use out of it.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you! I'm sure my husband
appreciates this as well!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's so generous of you, sir! You've
made me very happy today.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar>Heeey! Welcome! It's your first time at
my store, right?<sp:0:4:0>It's the only place to shop here in
Lookout Landing. I know it looks a
little thrown together.
But I stock a nice selection of goods.
I ran a store back in my <clr:0000>hometown<clr:ffff>, so
I hope you'll support my place here!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm really proud of the <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>
that I'm now able to bring in from
<clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>That village is in Necluda—far, far away
in the southeast on its distant edge.
So that cheese is a real rarity here!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I had to close up shop in my <clr:0000>hometown<clr:ffff>.
It just wasn't possible to do business
there anymore...
Ah! Do you like cheese? My shipment
of <clr:0000>Hateno cheese <clr:ffff>just arrived!<sp:0:4:0>It's a rare product imported from
<clr:0000>Hateno Village <clr:ffff>in Necluda to the
southeast! I highly recommend it!
We appreciate your business!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So you went to Lurelin Village. Thanks for
telling me about what's happening there.

I know those pirates will be gone
someday...and in the meantime, I'll work
hard at running my business here!
Back to it!
Com_Talk_05b:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:ffff>Anything else to sell? The more I put on
my shelves, the more money I'll make—<sp:5:0:0>
and the sooner I can go back home.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Lurelin Village is safe, which means
I can focus one hundred percent on
my customers!
Com_Talk_05c:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:ffff>Are you gonna sell me anything else?
It'd make me happy, and my husband too!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Lurelin Village is safe, which means
I can focus one hundred percent on
my customers!
On that note, I just received a shipment
of Hateno cheese!<sp:0:4:0>It's a rare product imported from
<clr:0000>Hateno Village <clr:ffff>in Necluda to the
southeast! I highly recommend it!
We appreciate your business!
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks! Be sure to look around—we have
some rare products in stock.
Com_Talk_04: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS><clr:ffff>Mm, no rush. Take your time deciding!
Com_Talk_02b: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:ffff>Goody, goody! I'm glad I got that!
Com_Talk_05:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:ffff>Our selection's limited, so if you sell
me stuff, that'll really help!
Com_Talk_02c: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks! I'll buy more if you'd like!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar>Heeey! Welcome! It's your first time at
my store, right?<sp:0:4:0>It's the only place to shop here in
Lookout Landing. I know it looks a
little thrown together...
But I stock a nice selection of goods.
I ran a store back in my <clr:0000>hometown<clr:ffff>, so
I hope you'll support my place here!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Someday, I'll be able to go back to
my <clr:0000>hometown<clr:ffff>. And until then, I'll sell
as much stuff as I can!
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The prices are the prices, no matter how
important you are. No discounts.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I come from a small fishing town called
<clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It's waaay to the <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff>, on the
<clr:0000>southeastern corner <clr:ffff>of Hyrule. Used to
be a peaceful place too.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Then the <clr:0000>pirates <clr:ffff>arrived.<sp:0:4:0>I used to run the village's <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>.
But when those pirates arrived, I had to
grab all the goods I could carry and run.<sp:0:4:0>I... <sp:5:0:0>I don't know how it's going there now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>I hope I can return someday. But for
now, I'll just keep selling as much stuff
as I can!
Please, let me know if there's anything
you'd like!
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Looks like your pouch is full. Nothing else
will fit in there.<sp:0:4:0>If there's anything you don't need, I can
buy it off you.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you want something, just pick it out and
let me know!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar>Heeey! Welcome! You're up bright and
early today.<sp:0:4:0>Go ahead. Buy lots and lots!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I had to close up shop in my <clr:0000>hometown<clr:ffff>.
It just wasn't possible to do business
there anymore...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Not interested?<sp:0:4:0>That's fine. It's been a pleasure doing
business with you!
Talk_08: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you! This'll really help me out!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My hometown is safe, so I can focus one
hundred percent on my customers!

On that note, you've simply gotta try
that <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>It's a rare product imported from
<clr:0000>Hateno Village <clr:ffff>in Necluda to the
southeast!
We appreciate your business!
Talk_09: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Good eye! That was hard to get ahold of!
